title: Update Location section primary address text

requirements.summary: Ensure the Location section displays the exact primary address "Jandi Mor, GT road, Gujar Khan, Punjab, Pakistan" as a fallback and renders the structured address without duplicating "Gujar Khan".
acceptanceCriteria: When the restaurant profile query has no address data, the Location page displays exactly "Jandi Mor, GT road, Gujar Khan, Punjab, Pakistan" as the main address line.

When the restaurant profile has address data, the Location pageâ€™s main address line renders as "{street}, {city}, {region}, {country}" and matches "Jandi Mor, GT road, Gujar Khan, Punjab, Pakistan" given the updated default profile values.

file_operations.description: Update the Location section to use the exact fallback primary address string "Jandi Mor, GT road, Gujar Khan, Punjab, Pakistan" when profile/address data is unavailable or incomplete, and build the structured address defensively (e.g., avoid repeating the city if it already appears in the street) so "Gujar Khan" is not duplicated between address parts or helper text.
